sentences.en: As for satiety Don Juan insists upon it, on the contrary.
sentences.cn: 至于满足,唐璜则相反,他一直坚持如此.

sentences.en: Conersely, satiety pathways are markedly less functional.
sentences.cn: 而与此相反, 饱满感功能显著减少.

sentences.en: Focusing on complex carbs like whole grains helps stabilize sugar, and lots of fiber increases satiety.
sentences.cn: 通过吃复杂结构的碳水化合物,比如全麦食品,可以帮助稳定血糖, 同时大量的纤维会让你早早吃饱.

sentences.en: Focusing on complex carts like whole grains helps stabilize sugar, and lots of fiber increases satiety.
sentences.cn: 多吃复合碳水化合物热缛笫称纺芄黄轿妊茿,高纤维食品能够提高饱腹感.

sentences.en: Keeping silent and thinking , studying without satiety, teaching others without weariness.
sentences.cn: 默而识之,学而不厌, 诲人不倦.

sentences.en: physical feelings of hunger and satiety
sentences.cn: 饥饿和饱足等生理感觉

sentences.en: Researchers say these sensory clues, in addition to internal body changes signal satiety.
sentences.cn: 研究人员指出, 除了人体内部的变化外,这些感官提示会引起饱足感.

sentences.en: Some or bud, satiety may look like an immediate rupture.
sentences.cn: 有的还是花骨朵儿, 看起来饱胀得马上要破裂似的.

sentences.en: Their presence in foods induces satiety at meal time.
sentences.cn: 它们在食物中的存在诱导进餐时的满足感.

sentences.en: There is no satiety in study.
Tom was filled to satiety by the big dinner.
sentences.cn: 汤姆在大宴上吃得不能再吃了.

words.tran_cn: 满意，满足；赔偿；乐事；赎罪
充分满足；使饱享（sate的过去式）

trans.tran_en: the condition of feeling that you have had enough of something, for example food
